name: 李穎玟
objective: The focused topics of the course are:1.First-Order ODEs 2. Second-Order Linear ODEs 3. Laplace Transforms
schedule:
17-Sep　　Introduction 
24-Sep　　First-Order ODEs (I)
27-Sep　　First-Order ODEs(II)
4-Oct　　First-Order ODEs(III)
15-Oct　　Second-Order Linear ODEs (I)
18-Oct　　Second-Order Linear ODEs (II)
25-Oct　　Second-Order Linear ODEs (III)
1-Nov　　Midterm
8-Nov　　Higher Order Linear ODEs(I)
15-Nov　　Higher Order Linear ODEs (II)
22-Nov　　Higher Order Linear ODEs (III)
29-Nov　　 Series Solutions of ODEs. Special Functions(I)
6-Dec　　 Series Solutions of ODEs. Special Functions (II)
13-Dec　　 Series Solutions of ODEs. Special Functions (III)
20-Dec　　 Laplace Transforms (I)
27-Dec　　 Laplace Transforms (II)
3-Jan　　 Laplace Transforms (III)
10-Jan　　Final
remarks: 本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
